title: NH Primary, Rep. Bruce Westerman, Climate
itunes:title: NH Primary, Rep. Bruce Westerman, Climate
description:
Panel Guests: Max Burns, Democratic Strategist; Contributor at The Daily Beast and The Independent and Scott Tranter, CEO of 0ptimus and former Data Science Director for Marco Rubio for President.

Kevin also talked with Congressman Bruce Westerman, a Republican representing the 4th district of Arkansas about climate change and his legislation that sets a goal of planting one trillion trees around the world.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
